meanings.definition: The designing and selling of hats for women.
meanings.sent1: She studied millinery to learn how to create beautiful hats.
meanings.sent2: The millinery business was booming with new designs for the summer season.
meanings.sent3: The millinery class was full of creativity and laughter as they crafted unique hats.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a millinery of ideas, each one more stylish than the last.
meanings.sent5: The art of millinery transformed simple materials into stunning fashion statements.

meanings.definition: A hat shop or department within a store.
meanings.sent1: The millinery on Main Street had a wide selection of elegant hats.
meanings.sent2: She visited the millinery to find the perfect hat for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The millinery was so crowded that it felt like a hat party.
meanings.sent4: The millinery stood out in the mall like a beacon of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The old millinery had a charm that transported customers back in time.
